sentence.Network_en: He pretended to be affronted, but inwardly he was pleased.
sentence.Network_cn: 他假装受到了冒犯，但其实内心很高兴。

sentence.Network_en: Sara, while remaining outwardly amiable toward all concerned, was inwardly furious.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨拉尽管表面上对所有相关的人依然和蔼可亲，内心却怒火中烧。

An Extra Ten Minutes ... 26.cutshort 中断 27.inwardly adv. 思想上，在内心 28.budge vi. 微微移动.

简爱经典对白 _ 上海疯狂英语 ... 18. notion n. 观念;想法 19. inwardly ad. 在内部;内里 20. necessity n. 必须;必然.

list.abs: What we achieve inwardly will change outer really ., 我们对内在修养的追求将会改变外在现实.
They inwardly resolved to watch him nights ,, 他们暗自决定 , 晚上要去盯梢他,
I sometimes wonder if too many of our young friends are overly literate , they are starving inwardly from loneliness and alienation .有时候我很想知道我们大部分年轻朋友是不是过度依赖电脑，甚至在内心渴望寂寞与疏远。

entry.def: Your inward thoughts or feelings are the ones that you do not express or show to other people.
An inward movement is one towards the inside or centre of something.

example.ex: ...a sharp, inward breath like a gasp...
example.tran: 像倒抽气一样猛地吸入一口气

example.ex: The athlete takes off from one leg from an inward twist.
example.tran: 这名运动员向内转体一周单腿起跳。

auth_sentence.content: He was inwardly apprehensive as well as outwardly adventurous.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was inwardly apprehensive as well as outwardly adventurous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was inwardly apprehensive as well as outwardly adventurous.

auth_sentence.content: He struggles inwardly because he has not succeeded in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: He struggles inwardly because he has not succeeded in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He struggles inwardly because he has not succeeded in the world.

auth_sentence.content: But inwardly you are asking yourself questions.
auth_sentence.res_content: But inwardly you are asking yourself questions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But inwardly you are asking yourself questions.

sentences.cn: 他们从心底里怀疑这些事实。

sentences.en: He groaned inwardly at the thought of spending another day in that place.
sentences.cn: 一想到要在那儿再呆上一天，他暗暗叫苦。

sentences.en: He is a wolf in sheep’s clothing,outwardly kind but inwardly vicious!
sentences.cn: 他是个披着羊皮的狼,外貌仁慈,内心狠毒!
